specifications.Finish: Chemical > Enzyme Enzymes treatment offers a remarkably soft hand-feel by gently breaking down the fibers’ surface, resulting in a smoother and cleaner texture. This treatment also reduces pilling and fuzz, enhancing the fabric’s durability and maintaining a clean appearance
specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > Slub Slub yarn is made with varying thicknesses, causing the fabric to have a bumpy texture. It adds a unique texture and character to the fabric's surface.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it. Regenerated > Modal This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location. Chemical > Enzyme Piece printing on enzyme/bio-washed fabric can cause staining. Therefore, please refrain from piece printing on this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Sweatshirts
